item.description:
During a problematic shoot for an RV industrial video in 1988, Jack Rebney unwittingly forged a place in the affections of millions. Dubbed such titles as: “Winnebago Man”, “The Funniest Man in the World,”, "The Peter Finch of RV's" the profanity-filled outtakes were circulated––first by homemade videotapes, and later, after the advent of YouTube, on the Internet. Rebney inadvertently became one of the first “viral” video superstars.
The trailer Says it all: <xobject width="445" height="364"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/zSWUWPx2VeQ&hl=en&fs=1&color1=0xe1600f&color2=0xfebd01&border=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="445" height="364" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
item.name: Winnebago Man
